Package com.csse3200.game.components

Class TowerStatsComponent

java.lang.Object
com.csse3200.game.components.Component
com.csse3200.game.components.TowerStatsComponent
public class TowerStatsComponent extends Component
Component storing stats for a tower, such as health, damage, range, and attack cooldown.

  • Field Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • TowerStatsComponent

      public TowerStatsComponent(int health, float damage, float range, float attackCooldown)
      Constructs a TowerStatsComponent with the given stats.
      Parameters:
      health - Initial health of the tower
      damage - Damage dealt per attack
      range - Attack range in game units
      attackCooldown - Time between attacks (seconds)

      Sets the tower's health, clamped to a minimum of 0.

      Resets the attack timer to zero.

      Increments the attack timer by delta seconds.

    • canAttack

      public boolean canAttack()
      Returns:
      True if the tower can attack (timer >= cooldown)

    • getAttackSpeed

      public float getAttackSpeed()
      Returns the attack speed (attacks per second). If attackCooldown is 0, returns 0 to avoid division by zero.
      Returns:
      Attack speed (attacks per second)
